switch.question: Can I switch between plans?
switch.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to Plus anytime and downgrade back to Free at the end of your billing period.

trial.question: Is there a free trial for Plus?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day free trial of Plus features for all new users.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and various regional payment methods through our payment processor.

student.question: Do you offer student discounts?
student.answer: Yes! Students can get 50% off Plus subscriptions with a valid student email.

offline.question: Can I use the bot offline?
offline.answer: The bot requires an internet connection to provide AI translations and sync your progress.

data.question: Is my data safe?
data.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and never sell your data. Your learning progress is private and secure.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your Plus subscription at any time. You'll keep Plus features until the end of your current billing period.

languages.question: Are all languages included in both plans?
languages.answer: Yes! All 13 languages are available in both Free and Plus plans. The difference is in the number of daily words and additional features.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Try Plus risk-free. If you're not satisfied within 30 days, we'll refund your payment - no questions asked.
